snippet.title: BMW to ride in with 115-mile range e-scooter?
snippet.description:
BMW to ride in with 115-mile range e-scooter?
BMW has cracked the electric scooter nut and will start to sell what appears to be a genuinely usable electric bike in 2011. That's assuming a report in overseas magazine Solo Scooter is correct, of course. The putative BMW machine will apparently have a top speed of 120kph (75mph) and a range on a full charge of its lithium- â€¦
Alun Taylor, 16 Jul 2009
